content.html: I was looking for a fan translation of Morrowind on a Spanish forum back in 2005 when I first encountered the early screenshots of The Elder Scrolls IV—and I couldn't believe my eyes. Even more than Morrowind itself, and in a way that Skyrim never matched for me later, Oblivion has an importance in my life that’s hard to overstate. Today's reveal had my eyes widening—again.

Disappointed (but almost done) with Dragon Age: The Veilguard, and just two days away from Clair Obscur: Expedition 33... I already see myself going in and out of the Imperial City sewers once again tonight, goosebumps and all.
